6032h, 4407m, 27625e, 20200w xdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. An ivory jaguar stands here vigilantly, golden eyes taking in the surroundings. There are 3 guardian angels here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Seifur Maurois is here, looking sternly about himself. He wields a Targossian darkbow in both hands. Reonna is here. Argent Artificer Tesha al Ashtad, Golden Justice is riding on a luminous ivory jaguar. She wields a lucent whip of pristine ivory silk in her left hand and a spiritual mace in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Soldier Ada Young stands here looking happy. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is here. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

PUBLIC NEWS #19423                                      (04/17/2014 at 12:41)  
From   : Accipiter
To     : Vastar, the Skylord
Subject: In which deception is approved
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear Lord vastar,

It is good to see that in Your time away from the light of Achaea You had time to absorb the teaching of Lord Twilight. The strong foundation in lies and deception You are apparently giving Your followers will surely benefit them in their quest for Freedom, though perhaps it will raise questions on Your assurance that the Archons of Ashtan were elected with 'Freedom'.

I look forward to seeing upon which other Divine Your realm intrudes,

Yours in anticipation,
Accipiter

Penned by my hand on the 22nd of Valnuary, in the year 652 AF.

PUBLIC NEWS #19424                                      (04/17/2014 at 13:34)  
From   : Vastar, the Skylord
To     : Accipiter
Subject: On lies, deception, and idiocy
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
That you believe penning such a missive would do anything other than prove the foresight My Primarch had in denying you outright is the definition of hubris.

When mortals begin to believe any of the decrepit waste that flows from your mouth, or from the ink directed by your fingers, that will signal the time in which I will give up any semblance of hope for the world.

Never again make Me the address of your foolishness, or you will learn how much displeasure I take in outright deception.

- The Skylord

Penned by My hand on the 23rd of Valnuary, in the year 652 AF.

Approaching Targossas (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. An obsidian eye sigil is here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. 6032h, 4449m, 27625e, 20106w cekdb-
A living puppet of Caladbolg, its chest heaves a bit and its arms and legs move. Every detail of it is perfectly rendered, though the look in its eyes betrays no intelligence. It is a tool, not a fully living creature.
It has 6 months of usefulness left.
The puppet looks to have been fashioned approximately 101 times.
It weighs about 2 pounds and 0 ounce(s).
It bears the distinctive mark of Extrum.

A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. There are 6 bloodroot leaves in 5 groups here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. There are 6 pieces of kelp in 5 groups here. There are 2 pinches of ground realgar in a group here. A dull grey chip of magnesium rests on the ground. A small crystal pyramid rests nearby. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A forked ginseng root has been dropped here. There are 2 skullcap flowers in a group here. There are 2 slippery elms in a group here. There are 2 kola nuts in a group here. There are 3 pieces of bayberry bark in 2 groups here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 4 groups here. There are 2 goldenseal roots in 2 groups here. A small lobelia seed lies here. There are 2 pinches of ground malachite in 2 groups here. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the east.  The soul of Gyrth roams the land, bodiless. The soul of Mithridates roams the land, bodiless. Antidas Wintermourne, Luminous Shade is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an ephemeral bow of shadow in both hands.
You see exits leading north, east, west, and northwest.

You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Resting on a pair of back legs, a massive jade frog is here, scanning the room with large, bulbous eyes. A tiny monkey with black and white fur stands here, staring off into the distance listlessly. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. There are 2 crystal spiderlings here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. A valerian leaf has been dropped here. A bit of slippery elm lies here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. There are 2 ferrum flakes in a group here. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 3 magnesium chips in 3 groups here. There are 2 goldenseal roots in 2 groups here. There are 2 potash crystals in 2 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 2 groups here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is here. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. The Blue Dragon Jhui's imposing form looms.

6032h, 4445m, 27530e, 20200w cexkdb-
Before a carved tunnel (road).
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of D'mass the Destroyer has been erected. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A dyed gold poster bearing the title "A Star is Born" has been hung here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here.  The Blue Dragon Jhui's imposing form looms. Antidas Wintermourne, Luminous Shade is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields a curved dirk of crimson steel in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading northeast and in.

Before a carved tunnel (road).
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Resting on a pair of back legs, a massive jade frog is here, scanning the room with large, bulbous eyes. A tiny monkey with black and white fur stands here, staring off into the distance listlessly. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. There are 2 crystal spiderlings here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. There are 2 ferrum flakes in a group here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. There are 3 magnesium chips in 3 groups here. There are 2 potash crystals in 2 groups here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  Yiwen is riding on a stone gargoyle. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right.
You see exits leading northeast and south.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Resting on a pair of back legs, a massive jade frog is here, scanning the room with large, bulbous eyes. A tiny monkey with black and white fur stands here, staring off into the distance listlessly. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. There are 2 crystal spiderlings here.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Resting on a pair of back legs, a massive jade frog is here, scanning the room with large, bulbous eyes. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. There are 2 crystal spiderlings here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 2 guardian angels here.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Resting on a pair of back legs, a massive jade frog is here, scanning the room with large, bulbous eyes. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.

A small gold ink lies discarded here. A small blue ink lies discarded here. A small red ink lies discarded here. A small yellow ink lies discarded here. A small green ink lies discarded here. A small purple ink lies discarded here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. A pellet of arsenic sits on the floor. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A valerian leaf has been dropped here. A bit of slippery elm lies here. There are 2 pinches of ground malachite in 2 groups here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  The soul of Jhui roams the land, bodiless. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. The soul of Yiwen roams the land, bodiless. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

The approach to Ashtan (road).
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. Dark shadows enshroud a pair of giant emerald serpent heads as they writhe, entwined atop an obsidian altar. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. You say, "Duanathar."

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment.  The Blue Dragon Jhui's imposing form looms. The Blue Dragon Kross' imposing form looms.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  The Blue Dragon Kross' imposing form looms. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. The Blue Dragon Jhui's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Velocity Bow in both hands. The Blue Dragon Kross' imposing form looms. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A nebulous water weird is here. Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A nebulous water weird is here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Seifur Maurois is here. He wields a Targossian darkbow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Reonna is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. The Silver Dragon Lachlan's imposing form looms. Forerunner Rayle Adienn is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.

6032h, 4394m, 27625e, 20194w cexkdb-
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. The soul of Yiwen roams the land, bodiless. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. A jet-black falcon glides just above, looking for prey. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Nearly indiscernible in the shadows, a majestic peryton stands stoically here. A Baalzadeen demon towers over you, filling you with dread. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground.  Blade Aspirant Kaevan Lichlord, Ward of Mhaldor is here. He wields a runic totem bearing the arms of Kaevan in both hands. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Raphaelan mace in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the arms of Avianca in her right. Deacon Crixos Nithilar is here, sleeping soundly. He wields a blackened cavalry shield with ivory accents in his right hand. Minion Gog, Disciple of Proficy is here, sprawled on the floor. Sir Tirac Savril, Champion of the Blade is riding on an ashen peryton. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Lord Marshal Hasar Lichlord is here, sprawled on the floor. He wields a sinister staff with a strange orb in his left hand and an obsidian dagger in his right. Father Nocroth dis Serenath is here, sprawled on the floor. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields a soulspear in his left hand and a weathered targe shield studded with ivory in his right. Tyrannus Ruth Yuridja-Keyte, Sartai Navarch is here, sprawled on the floor. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

6032h, 4473m, 27415e, 20200w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. A jet-black falcon glides just above, looking for prey. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A nebulous water weird is here. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. Terrifying even in death, the broken form of a blood steed lies here.  Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. Reonna is here. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. The soul of Kaevan roams the land, bodiless. Prophet of War, Lothiac Gothfraidh-Silversand is here. He wields a vine-wreathed sylvanic quarterstaff in both hands. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Raphaelan mace in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the arms of Avianca in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Heavy swagger evident in his stance, Pathfinder Colgano LastGoodbye-Vorondil is here. He wields a throwing axe in his right hand. Blackthorn Iakimen Longshanks, Virid Champion is here. He wields a lithe rapier engraved with elemental symbols in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

There are 2 water weirds here. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 fiery efreetis here. Terrifying even in death, the broken form of a blood steed lies here. Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Terrifying even in death, the broken form of a blood steed lies here. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. A nebulous water weird is here.  Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. Reonna is here. Melodie Le'Murzen, Arcthyos is here, vines undulating about her form. She is surrounded by one reflection of herself. Heavy swagger evident in his stance, Pathfinder Colgano LastGoodbye-Vorondil is here. He wields a throwing axe in his right hand. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Raphaelan mace in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the arms of Avianca in her right. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Bloated with blood and flesh, a frenzied bloodworm sets its beady eyes on you. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. There are 2 guardian angels here. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Terrifying even in death, the broken form of a blood steed lies here. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A fiery efreeti spins madly here. A nebulous water weird is here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Hands of rotting flesh and white bone push up from the ground. Reonna is here. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Raphaelan mace in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the arms of Avianca in her right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Melodie Le'Murzen, Arcthyos is here, vines undulating about her form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Heavy swagger evident in his stance, Pathfinder Colgano LastGoodbye-Vorondil is here. He wields a throwing axe in his right hand. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.

Father Xer Savril, Harbinger of Slaughter (male Mhun).
He is 77 years old, having been born on the 2nd of Aeguary, 575 years after the fall of the Seleucarian Empire.
He is ranked 120th in Achaea.
He is an extremely credible character.
He is rapidly approaching the ranks of the Infamous.
He is a member of the Quisalis Mark.
He is an Exsusiai in Mhaldor.
He is a Crimson Paragon in the army of Mhaldor.
He is considered to be approximately 110% of your might.
He is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
His motto: 'All shall walk in fear before the Lord.'
See HONOURS DEEDS XER to view his 5 special honours.

6032h, 4428m, 27625e, 20200w cexkdb-
ANNOUNCE NEWS #4112                                     (04/17/2014 at 17:23)  
From   : Tecton, the Terraformer
To     : Everyone
Subject: Character persistence
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As technology advances, we've got more available resources for storing information, so we've tweaked how long characters last before being purged. The new schema is as follows:

Hours Played |  Days before deletion
-------------------------------------
   < 1       |         30
   < 10      |         90
   < 30      |        360
   < 100     |        720

If you've played over 100 hours, or have ever purchased credits or lessons, your character will not be deleted for inactivity.

Check out HELP DELETION for more information.

Penned by My hand on the 2nd of Lupar, in the year 652 AF.
6032h, 4404m, 27625e, 20196w cexkdb-
POETRY NEWS #4681                                       (04/17/2014 at 23:04)  
From   : Trouvere Camillia
To     : Everyone
Subject: Sources Of Happiness
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Darkness rises constantly,
trying to crush the light,
but as I bask
in nature's beauty,
I know
it will be all right.
I walk through the streets of Caerwitrin
watching the children run andplay.
Whatever I was feeling,
I have a smile on my face today.
I see the people thriving,
cheerful in spite of the snow.
They know that it's a hazard,
but they stand firm,
they won't go.

Penned by my hand on the 7th of Lupar, in the year 652 AF.

You are pulled to the north by an unseen force.
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A shimmering orb lies here, illuminating the surrounding area with a slight glow. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A nebulous water weird is here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. Reonna is here. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A nebulous water weird is here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy.

Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A nebulous water weird is here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6032h, 4448m, 27317e, 20196w cexkdb-
An unseen presence whispers in your ear, "There is no more, friend."
6032h, 4448m, 27317e, 20196w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. The decapitated head of Aelios has been carelessly tossed aside. A deep green crystalline cube floats here. A dark spinning crystal spiral is here, floating. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Unable to further protect the Cypress of Mysteries, the mangled corpse of a Qurnok warrior lies here. A Qurnok guard lies lifelessly in a pool of crimson blood, a look of extreme terror in his frozen eyes. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. The decapitated head of Aelios has been carelessly tossed aside. A deep green crystalline cube floats here. A dark spinning crystal spiral is here, floating. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Unable to further protect the Cypress of Mysteries, the mangled corpse of a Qurnok warrior lies here. A Qurnok guard lies lifelessly in a pool of crimson blood, a look of extreme terror in his frozen eyes. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.

Dajio (male Rajamala).
He is 26 years old, having been born on the 1st of Sarapin, 626 years after the fall of the Seleucarian Empire.
He is ranked 990th in Achaea.
He is the 44th ranked combatant with a rating of 100.
He is an extremely credible character.
He is one of the Infamous.
He is considered to be approximately 40% of your might.
He is a mentor and able to take on proteges.
His motto: 'Stay to your word and live on the edge.'
See HONOURS DEEDS DAJIO to view his 1 special honours.

6344h, 4473m, 27857e, 20196w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 2 guardian angels here.  The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Lady Aeryi Thelhawk, Chosen of Phaestus is riding on an alabaster pegasus. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 2 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 3 swarms of bees here. There are 2 water weirds here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A piece of bayberry bark is lodged here. There are 2 pieces of irid moss in a group here. There are 2 pieces of kelp in a group here. The twisted remains of Gyrth lie here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  Greenthorn Swadryt Shiva, Ngahe Tihuna is here. He wields a wyvern-etched druidic quarterstaff in both hands. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

6344h, 4398m, 29110e, 20195w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A nebulous water weird is here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. The soul of Gyrth roams the land, bodiless. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a gleaming scimitar in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A shimmering orb lies here, illuminating the surrounding area with a slight glow. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Reonna is here.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6344h, 4440m, 29106e, 19731w cexkdb-
A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A shimmering orb lies here, illuminating the surrounding area with a slight glow. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. Reonna is here.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune shaped like a butterfly has been sketched into the ground here. A rune like an open eye has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected.

Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Kei Greywards is here. She wields a bard's flute in her left hand and a targe shield of rutilated glass in her right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Sir Achilles, Knight of the Aarash Kheyr is riding on a charcoal black hippogriff. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.

6331h, 4211m, 28605e, 20019w cekdb-

6331h, 4211m, 28605e, 20019w cekdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here.  Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here.  Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.

6344h, 4473m, 27959e, 19955w cekdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here. He wields Soaring Storms in his left hand.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.
