6344h, 4358m, 27425e, 19771w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare. There are 5 aurum flakes in 4 groups here. There are 2 pinches of ground realgar in 2 groups here. There are 3 magnesium chips in 3 groups here. Nestled into the ground is a small chunk of potash crystal.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.

6344h, 4398m, 26709e, 19748w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

6344h, 4445m, 26189e, 19787w cexkdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 swarms of bees here. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. The decapitated head of Dajio has been carelessly tossed aside. You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

The approach to Ashtan (road).
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune resembling a volcano has been sketched into the ground here. Dark shadows enshroud a pair of giant emerald serpent heads as they writhe, entwined atop an obsidian altar. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

On the Prelatorian Highway (road).
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A large muddy ditch floods the road with dirty water. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  The Black Dragon Dannyl's imposing form looms. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading northeast and south.

6344h, 4473m, 25337e, 20200w cexkdb-
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Soldier Aelios Azon stands here looking happy. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A bustling farrier's yard.

Summon (Puppetry)                             Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET SUMMON
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Required: 30
                   Used    :  6

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Summons your puppet's model to you, providing he is in the same area or an adjacent room.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. The ground is slick with ice. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the east. A holocaust globe is here.  Yiwen is riding on a stone gargoyle. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. The Silver Dragon Taraus' imposing form looms. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here, sprawled on the floor. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right.

6344h, 4455m, 27982e, 20200w cexkdb-
Blackstone military quarter.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A proud desert steed stands here, pawing at the ground. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms. Soldier Ada Young stands here looking happy.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, south, west, and northwest.

6344h, 4429m, 27982e, 20196w cexkdb-
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. The ground is slick with ice. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the east. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. A small flake of gleaming aurum rests upon the ground. There are 5 pinches of ground malachite in 5 groups here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. A simple disc of deep claret crystal lies here nearly forgotten. A pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal lies here.  Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here, sprawled on the floor. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. The soul of Yiwen roams the land, bodiless. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the east. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  The soul of Yiwen roams the land, bodiless. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. The Champions' Bridge.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. An obsidian eye sigil is here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A proud desert steed stands here, pawing at the ground.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, south, west, and northwest.

6344h, 4460m, 28883e, 20192w cexkdb-
You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  The Black Dragon Dannyl's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. Watered-down blood surrounds the lifeless form of a lake fairy. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. The Silver Dragon Draekar's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Atop the battlements of the city wall.
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 giant eagles here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A pile of ash is all that is left of a malevolent echo. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Chasing his tail excitedly, a Jaruvian retriever puppy runs about in circles. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. There are 5 cedar chairs with a covering of bright blue fabric here. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here. Eldritch General Hirst da'Miras is here, shrouded. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields a serrated, darksteel dirk in his right hand. Reckless (Puppetry)                           Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET RECKLESS
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Required: 15
                   Used    : 1

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
With this ability, you'll cause your victim to think he or she is always on full health.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6344h, 4443m, 29110e, 20194w cekdb-
A living puppet of Mithridates, its chest heaves a bit and its arms and legs move. Every detail of it is perfectly rendered, though the look in its eyes betrays no intelligence. It is a tool, not a fully living creature.

Atop the battlements of the city wall.
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 giant eagles here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. Chasing his tail excitedly, a Jaruvian retriever puppy runs about in circles. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. There are 5 cedar chairs with a covering of bright blue fabric here. Kohai Aquilora Straidthan, Ashuran Initiate is here. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading east and down.

6344h, 4473m, 29110e, 20200w cexkdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. The Green Dragon Carmell's imposing form looms.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6344h, 4403m, 29110e, 20196w cexkdb-
Illusion (Puppetry)                           Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET ILLUSION <illusion>
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Required: 5
                   Used    : 1

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Cause your puppet's namesake to see something specific. You may embed a single newline by including the characters \n at the appropriate spot.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6344h, 4443m, 29110e, 20194w cexkdb-
You close your eyes and hold a puppet of Fendrel up to your forehead.

Atop the battlements of the city wall.
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Perched upon the edge of the battlement, a statue of Tanris Rozzan stares sightlessly across the land. Mounted atop the battlement, a mighty wooden ballista points out over the gates. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 giant eagles here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. Chasing his tail excitedly, a Jaruvian retriever puppy runs about in circles. There are 5 cedar chairs with a covering of bright blue fabric here. Kohai Aquilora Straidthan, Ashuran Initiate is here. Her face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.
You see exits leading east and down.

6344h, 4418m, 29110e, 20200w cexkdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. A pileated gibbon reclines upon the ground, scrunched behind its long limbs. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Ever-vigilant, the Zarathustran eagle monitors the area for threats. An obsidian eye sigil is here. Muscles ripple beneath the shining coat of a black destrier. There are 2 stone gargoyles here. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Fading into the shadows, Sakuri eyes her surrounding suspiciously. Calmly standing nearby is a white charger in pristine armour. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead.  Yiwen is riding on a stone gargoyle. He wields a Shield of Absorption in his left hand and an elemental staff in his right. Sempai Datrius Neige is here. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here. Venser is here. A frozen chamber beneath the barracks (indoors).
A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Lying flat on the ground is a key-shaped sigil. An obsidian eye sigil is here. There are 5 metal tanks radiating waves of heat here. There are 2 Shornwall defenders here. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Some irid moss has been left here. A piece of dried-out kelp has been left here. A bloodroot leaf lies here. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A swarm of bees hovers menacingly nearby. A bright-eyed zebra finch hops along the ground, loosing bursts of merry, warbling song. A fragile crystal spiderling skitters about. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. A pike with the decapitated head of Kross has been erected. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Preening its metal-edged feathers, an enormous Stymphalian bird glares about itself with beady, red eyes. A pike with the decapitated head of Dajio has been erected. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.  Marcalo De'Unnero, Lin'Quei is here. Heavy swagger evident in his stance, Pathfinder Colgano LastGoodbye-Vorondil is here. Assassin Cyla Sar'vet-Shayan'Kor, The Silver Fang is here, impassive. She wields a needle-pointed dirk marred with char marks in her left hand and an iron-tipped whip marred with char marks in her right.

6294h, 4449m, 27625e, 20196w cexkdb-
Blackout (Puppetry)                           Known: Yes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Syntax:            PUPPET BLACKOUT
                   
Extra Information: Fashions:
                   Required: 20
                   Used    : 4

Works on/against:  Adventurers
Details:
Blackout some of the senses of your opponent, temporarily.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

6294h, 4449m, 27625e, 20200w cexkdb-
You draw a sharp fingernail across the torso of the puppet.

6294h, 4427m, 27625e, 20200w cexkdb-
A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A shimmering orb lies here, illuminating the surrounding area with a slight glow. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.

Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards.
You see exits leading north and south.

Amid the thriving indigo.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Pale violet flowers bloom upon a bushy indigo plant. An indigo nightfire butterfly flutters here peacefully. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. Mizik Corten, Herald of Ruin is here, shrouded. He wields an assassin's dirk in his left hand and an iron-tipped whip in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, west, and northwest.

6032h, 4404m, 27625e, 20072w cexkdb-
Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Romping playfully around is an inquisitive bear cub. A chubby polar bear cub sniffs inquisitively at the air. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6032h, 4473m, 27615e, 20109w cexkdb-
The Targossian barracks (indoors).
A wooden shelf, stained a deep, indigo hue, hangs upon the wall. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A miniature brazier of flawless crystal gleams steadily beneath a cloud of wood-scented smoke. Covered in grime, a one-handed atavian boy playfully chases his friend around the barracks. A gilt-framed portrait of Draekar hangs upon a wall. Carefully buffed to a pristine shine, a steel strongchest rests upon the ground. Shining in silver armour, Lady Talarna, Paladin of Learning, stands here deep in thought. There are 5 Brighthold watchmen here. Waddling nearby, a desert hedgehog snuffles eagerly at a scruffy girl's feet. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. There are 17 chipped iconic shards here. There are 10 smooth iconic shards here. A steel-plated chair is here.
You see a single exit leading down.

On the clouds (indoors).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A pike with the decapitated head of Atalkez has been erected, bearing the city arms of Targossas. A pike with the decapitated head of Isaiah has been erected. Weaving in an infinite loop with wings beating soundlessly, a winged, icy serpent eyes her surroundings with a cold stare.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

6032h, 4448m, 27495e, 20200w cexkb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Oathsworn Vithincus Shu'in-Crescent is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Brother Senel Vorondil-Windsong, Pilgrim of the Body is here.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.

A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.

6032h, 4473m, 26930e, 20067w cexkdb-
Blackstone military quarter.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. A dense mist of silver ripples in the air around the immense form of Ilona'neron, the Colossus. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. A proud desert steed stands here, pawing at the ground.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, south, west, and northwest.

Rally point.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. 6032h, 4447m, 27625e, 20127w cexkdb-
Rally point.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. There are 2 rugged war goats here. An ash-grey jaguar pauses here, golden eyes alight. A stone gargoyle flies overhead on leathery, grey wings. Towering above you, this massive mammoth has a thick, shaggy hide and long yellowed tusks. Twitching its wings, a charcoal black hippogriff majestically stands here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  A large barracks is here providing the city's forces with rest and refuge. Vice Admiral Avianca Shu'in-Crescent stands here, content with the world. She wields a Raphaelan mace in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the arms of Avianca in her right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading south, southwest, and west.
